hi and welcome you listening to the x-22

more countries pivot away from the

point we realize that the central bank's
they want complete control the

that the cryptocurrency market it is a

UBS the central banks and many other
banks were all together creating their
own type of system where they're gonna

that everything stays stable now of
course the volatility means that it's a

but we can see there's a lot of

open and free market and we can see that
there are certain government's here in

to put restrictions we know China has
been putting restrictions Russia wants
to put restrictions and they're doing

remember the central banking system does

currency they're creating currency out

and it doesn't matter where they're
located it makes no difference
whatsoever and we can see that certain

about China is very nervous about it the
United States is very nervous about it
because they want to control the system
now of course you have the central banks
that sit on top of all this where
they're the ones who are creating the
currencies for most of these countries
just like the EU we have them creating
the currency for most of the countries
within the EU and we see right now there
are many countries that are going to try
to stop this Russia for instance their
central bank they said that listen
they're going to support efforts to
block access
to external websites selling

remember the crypto market is completely

difficult to control except when the

currency and they tell everyone this is
the currency that you should be using
but the really free and open crypto
currency it is kept on many many servers
it's very very difficult to control and
we can see that they're doing whatever

now out in London we see that the
housing prices they are falling and they
have fallen in September the first time
in eight years the high-end lundi London

house sales are now down by over a very
large 1/3 and we can see right now the
bubbles are starting to pop in certain

these countries they are the not they
are not the ones who are actually

investors you name it they've been doing

seeing in Australia we're seeing it

here in the in the United States now
we've been looking at the real estate

we see something very very interesting
that commercial real estate market New
York's New York City is collapsing at
the same time that residential
foreclosures are surging to levels not
seen since 2009 now think about this
foreclosures of residential homes are
skyrocketing they're surging right now
now property shark points out today
foreclosures across New York City surged
by 79 percent year-on-year in the third

highest level since the Great Recession
all five boroughs registered increases
in the number of homes scheduled for
auction so what we're looking at right
now is
the beginning of a housing collapse now
we've been noticing this out in
California we've been seeing this out in
Toronto we've been seeing this in
Vancouver we've been seeing this around
the country and remember Case Shiller
only looks at those 20 cities and they

everything outside of these cities guess
what prices are falling traffic is
drying up and this is at a point where

with hardly any credit 0% down and once
again we are stuck in the same exact
position as we were back in 2008-2009
nothing has changed all they did was
create this gigantic illusion now the
IMF is out there and they're talking
about how the global economy is doing
and how the global growth outlook looks
and they're saying that yeah
things are starting to pick up things
are starting to look a lot better and
they're saying the global GDP is going

gives us their numbers it's always
overinflated they're saying that the
u.s. is going to be growing at 2.2

these numbers are completely manipulated
they are manipulated and they've gone

buried in the report there was this

that the global recovery may not be
sustainable not all
countries are participating inflation
offer remains below target with weak

people can't find jobs and most of these

we're very optimistic on the rest of the

if we go back in time Bernanke said
they're not forecasting any type of

right now and as you can see the central

you know they're just saying you know

we have Russia we have China we have

they're trying to keep this very very

reserve
so we're gonna see a lot of countries

in maybe use them to buy gold or

it happens very very slowly just like we

it's a very very slow process just like
